summary: This module provides a function version of the sm_io_getc macro for getting a character from a file with timeout support. It's part of the sendmail libsm library and includes thread-safety considerations.

logs.reason: This would occur if the file pointer passed to sm_io_getc is not of the expected type (SmFileMagic). The macro might log an error or abort execution.
logs.resolution: Ensure that only valid SM_FILE_T pointers that were properly initialized are passed to sm_io_getc. Check if the file was properly opened and not corrupted.
